CodeFile - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.model
A wrapper for com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile providing a simplified file access API.
CodeFile(VirtualFile) - Constructor in CodeFile
CodeLine - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A simple model of a key-value code line.
CodeLine.Comment - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A model of a comment code line.
CodeLine.Empty - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A model of an empty code line (i.e. a line break).
CodeLine.Text - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A model of an actual code line holding key-value information.

PropertiesFiles - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A simple helper for reading / writing .properties files.
propertyMissing(String, String) - Method in CodeFile
Implements the functionality to navigate through a file hierarchy tree with property access, and invoking setText(String) and save() on the child file, e.g. with this.subfolder.subsubfolder."

Parses the Properties file input and returns it as a List of CodeLines.

XmlFiles - Class in ch.codebulb.saveactiongroovyscripts.util
A simple helper for reading / writing very simple, 1-level key/value holding xml files, as e.g. used by Android SDK's res/values/strings.xml files.
